text: Milton Batista Vieira Júnior (born 27 March 1991), known as Milton Júnior, is a Brazilian footballer who plays for Grêmio Novorizontino as a defensive midfielder. ==Club career== Born in Nova Andradina, Mato Grosso do Sul, Milton Júnior graduated with Internacional's youth setup. He made his senior debuts in 2011, appearing with the side in the year's Campeonato Gaúcho. On 26 December 2011 Milton Júnior joined Sport in a season-long loan deal.Sport anuncia acerto com o volante Milton Júnior, do Inter (Sport announces deal with defensive midfielder Júnior, from Inter); Veja, 26 December 2011 After being a regular starter in Campeonato Pernambucano, he made his Série A debut on 6 June 2012, coming on as a second-half substitute in a 2–1 home win against Palmeiras. On 21 March 2013 Milton Júnior rescinded with Inter and signed for ASA until the end of the year.ASA acerta a contratação do volante Milton Júnior, ex-Internacional (ASA completes the signing of defensive midfielder Milton Júnior, former Internacional player); UOL Esporte, 21 March 2013 On 26 December, after appearing sparingly, he moved to Ferroviária.Paulista A2: Ferroviária contrata mais um jogador do Atlético-PR (Paulista A2: Ferroviária signs one more Atlético-PR player); Futebol Interior, 26 December 2014 On 1 June 2015 Milton Júnior was loaned to Portuguesa, until December.Série C: Portuguesa acerta com Milton Junior, ex- volante do Inter e campeão pela Ferroviária (Série C: Portuguesa signs Milton Júnior, former Inter defensive midfielder and champion with Ferroviária); Futebol Interior, 1 June 2015 On 18 January of the following year, after rescinding his contract with Ferroviária, he returned to Lusa in a permanent deal.Paulista A2: Portuguesa repatria Milton Júnior, ex-volante de Inter e Sport (Paulista A2: Portuguesa brings back Milton Júnior, former Inter and Sport defensive midfielder); Futebol Interior, 18 January 2016 ==References== ==External links== * ==External links== * Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:People from Mato Grosso do Sul Category:Brazilian footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Campeonato Brasileiro Série A players Category:Campeonato Brasileiro Série B players Category:Campeonato Brasileiro Série C players Category:J3 League players Category:Sport Club Internacional players Category:Sport Club do Recife players Category:SC Sagamihara players Category:Agremiação Sportiva Arapiraquense players Category:Associação Ferroviária de Esportes players Category:Associação Portuguesa de Desportos players Category:Red Bull Brasil players
title: Milton Júnior
